title: Coomassie Blue Stain
original description: To visual total protein in a given sample
steps:
1. Repeat steps 1-8 of the Western Blot protocol.
2. Once gels have finished running, cover gel with Coomassie Brilliant Blue, cover with lid, and incubate for 30 min
3. Rinse with water twice
4. Add enough destain solution to cover the gel and leave overnight, gently shaking at room temperature
ai_generated_description: The objective of this Coomassie Blue Stain protocol is to visually detect and analyze the total protein content in a given sample by staining proteins with Coomassie Brilliant Blue dye. This method allows researchers to assess the variety and quantity of proteins present, which can be useful in various molecular biology studies.
generated_pseudocode:
def assemble_gel_station(manufacturer_protocol): pass
def create_running_gel(dH2O, Tris_HCl, Acrylamide_Bis, SDS, APS, TEMED): pass
def create_stacking_gel(dH2O, Tris_HCl, Acrylamide_Bis, SDS, APS, TEMED): pass

def destain_gel(destain_solution, incubation_time): pass

# Protocol steps
assemble_gel_station(manufacturer_protocol="provided")
create_running_gel(dH2O="2.4 ml", Tris_HCl="1.5 ml", Acrylamide_Bis="2 ml", SDS="60 µL", APS="60 µL", TEMED="6 µL")
create_stacking_gel(dH2O="6.85 ml", Tris_HCl="2.5 ml", Acrylamide_Bis="1.3 ml", SDS="100 µL", APS="100 µL", TEMED="10 µL")
prepare_basin_buffers(running_buffer="1X Running Buffer")
load_samples_and_run(gel_cassette="gel cassette", samples="protein samples", ladder="protein ladder", voltage=140, time="1:30 hours")
prepare_membrane(methanol_time=2, transfer_buffer_time=2)
protein_transfer(transfer_protocol="Turbo-Blot")
block_membrane(blocking_solution="5% Milk", time="1 hour")
antibody_incubation(antibody_solution="primary antibody in 5% milk", time="overnight")
wash_membrane(wash_buffer="TBS-Tween", wash_times=3)
antibody_incubation(antibody_solution="secondary antibody in 5% milk", time="1 hour")
wash_membrane(wash_buffer="TBS-Tween", wash_times=3)
ecl_solution = prepare_ecl_solution(ecl_components={"ECL_component1": 1, "ECL_component2": 1})
develop_and_image_blot(ecl_solution=ecl_solution, volume=1, incubation_time=2, imaging_system="Bio-Rad ChemiDoc")

# Coomassie Blue Stain specific steps
incubate_with_coomassie_blue(incubation_time="30 minutes")
rinse_with_water(repetitions=2)
destain_gel(destain_solution="destain solution", incubation_time="overnight")
# end of protocol
